author: daxian-dbw
body:
Merge the release branch to master.
Make sure it's merged by `'Create a merge commit'` option.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: The failing test `'WiX file should have documentation about Visual Studio C++ redistributables'` should be disabled for now due to #4665. @mirichmo will submit a PR to disable it later targeting the master branch.

title: beta.6 release branch
